mapper.select: SELECT id, site_name,site_address,longitude,latitude,province,city,area,street, site_status,create_time,tel,imgurl, (select disname from t_district where disid = t.province) provinceName, (select disname from t_district where disid = t.city) cityName, (select disname from t_district where disid = t.area) areaName, (select disname from t_district where disid = t.street) streetName FROM t_site t WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT count(*) from t_car_stock tc LEFT JOIN t_site ts ON ts.id = tc.station_id WHERE tc.station_id = #{siteId} and tc.car_status = 0
